resources.string:
"This option will completely disable the critical battery shutdown of your device. The device will turn off once the battery has been drained completely. You should only use this when you know what you're doing (e.g. with a broken battery or as a one-time battery calibration)! This can harm your device, you've been warned!
Are you sure you want to enable this option?"
This beta expired. Please update to the newest version.

"You installed the Battery Shutdown Manager module! This app does require Xposed to work, please make sure that the module is activated in the Xposed Installer and you did a reboot.
If you encounter any bugs or have suggestions please contact me before leaving a bad review at the Google Play Store and I'll try to sort it out. It's impossible to test an app on all devices out there so incompatibilities on some devices aren't anything uncommon, but I'll do my best to fix them."

"I'm offering the freeload option as I don't want to force anyone to buy Pro who can't afford it or just wants to test the functionality.
Would be great if you decide to purchase Pro at a later stage to support development :)"

"This is an Xposed module which requires the Xposed Framework to work (root required!). It appears as if this device does not run Xposed so this app won't work.
Click the \"MORE INFO\" button to open instructions on how to obtain Xposed."
The Battery Shutdown Manager prevented your device to shutdown. This can harm your device!
Battery Shutdown Manager prevented a shutdown due to critical battery level

"Unfortunately the Xposed hook failed, it appears as if your ROM is not (yet) supported due to the vendor changing the standard shutdown method. This module works with AOSP and most Custom ROMs, if you want support for your ROM added please contact the dev at XDA, G+ or via Email.
Click the \"MORE INFO\" button to open the XDA support thread."
Click to follow +thetonyp on Google Plus
"Copyright © 2015 - tonyp G+: http://google.com/+thetonyp Tap to view my other apps!"
Xposed Installer not found! This app needs the Xposed framework to work!

Unfortunately the Xposed hook failed, it appears as if your ROM is not supported. This module works with AOSP and most Custom ROMs. If you want support for your ROM added please contact the dev at XDA, G+ or via Email.
"This module isn't activated in Xposed or you didn't do a reboot after activating it!"
"Apparently you didn't do a reboot after updating this app. Please do a reboot now to avoid any unexpected behaviour."
Support further development, allows customizing advanced options
Enable Pro features without actually purchasing the Pro version (with the exception of experimental features)
The module will wake up your device and show the shutdown dialog (by default only when the screen is on).
Show dialog when screen is off
Add a button to the shutdown dialog to power off the phone immediately
Click to show a preview of the shutdown dialog.
"Choose the countdown time. It's advised to use less than 20 seconds. Recommendation: 10 seconds"
"Use internal translations from your ROM for the shutdown dialog. Text will be in your device's language. Might not work with some non-AOSP ROMs."
Please consider to purchase pro in the future :)
Test Dialog: Your device would shut down now
Shows a countdown before shutting down your device on critical battery so you have time to connect your charger.
